name: Fat Boy Raids The Cookie Factory
summary: Fat Boy Raids The Cookie Factory is a retro-style game where players guide a cookie-craving character named Fat Boy through a series of challenging levels inside a cookie factory. The goal is to collect as many treats as possible while dodging factory guards and obstacles. With simple controls, the game combines arcade action with puzzle-solving.
